decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided (no drainage calculations to demonstrate  that the drainage system will not flood in a 1 in 30 year rainfall event, or flooding of the building in the 1 in 100 year + 40% climate change rainfall event and no permission from Thames Water to discharge into their foul network) to demonstrate that the development would not increase surface water flood risk on-site or elsewhere contrary to Policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted (2012).

It has not been demonstrated that the cumulative noise level for the proposed 5 air condition units would be at least 5dBA lower than the existing background noise level at any given time of operation to ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, contrary to policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Addition of a sliding door to south elevation, increase in first floor front balcony depth. Alteration to existing dormer roof, erection of a single storey rear outbuilding and front patio, climbing frame with swing and privacy screen. Installation of 5nos AC units and landscaping. (Retrospective)
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
